techmeme.title: An audit found that 10 top AI chatbots, including ChatGPT, Copilot, and Gemini, repeated false claims from a pro-Kremlin disinformation network 33% of the time (NewsGuard's Reality Check)
Former OpenAI policy researcher Miles Brundage criticizes OpenAI for "rewriting the history of GPT-2", after OpenAI outlined its safety and alignment philosophy (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
CoreWeave denies an FT report that Microsoft withdrew from some of its agreements ahead of CoreWeave's IPO, saying "there have been no contract cancellations" (Angela Christy/Reuters)
Sam Altman's World Network unveils World Chat, a "mini app" in the World App wallet for messaging and sending and receiving crypto, in beta on Android and iOS (Margaux Nijkerk/CoinDesk)
Trump signs an EO to establish a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and a Digital Asset Stockpile using BTC and other digital assets forfeited in criminal or civil cases (Jesse Coghlan/Cointelegraph)
